description.p: Totem, also known as Videos, is the official movie player of the GNOME desktop environment. It features a playlist, a full-screen mode, seek and volume controls, as well as keyboard navigation.
Totem comes with added functionality such as: subtitle downloader, support to watch live TV and VCD recording.

ul.li: Video thumbnailer for the file manager
Mozilla (Firefox) plugin to view movies inside your browser
